commands: su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'export KUBECONFIG=/home/ssm-user/{{EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}}/{{EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}}-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; cd /home/ssm-user; set -o pipefail; kubectl create ns {{NAMESPACE}}; eksctl anywhere delete package curated-metrics-server --cluster {{EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}} 2> /dev/null; eksctl anywhere create packages -f ./curated-metrics-server-package.yaml'
